channel.title: Is this how to portforward?
channel.description:
Open Cmd and type ipconfig/all
find my hamachi stuff and grab my hamachi ip Then Forward my ports to a dmz host(the dmz host will be my hamachi ip!) then forward all my ports on my hamachi ip??
